name: Back to the Speed Train
description:
A terrorist has put a bomb in your train. Keep the train above a certain speed limit or else it'll blow up! Feed it coal to speed it up but the faster it goes the faster the train breaks down and the more it slows down

 WASD - Move your conductor
 Space - Jump
 E - Use! Context-Sensitive 
    E can be used to:
        pick up coal
        drop it in the furnace
        repair in a designated repairing spot
        use the whistle
        use the cranes to refill your coal or tools inventory

 M - Turn off Music
 R - Restart game after it ends

 How To Play:

Adding coal to the furnace will increase your Train's movement speed but cause Repair spots to show up more often.
As more parts need fixing the health of the train goes down and the more it slows down every second
Use the whistle in the stretch before a signal to switch the track you're going to next doing so takes you into the tunnels.
Go into the tunnels to loop back faster and repair a random repair spot for you but beware! It'll be difficult to see anything.
Use the cranes when the train is right by drop-off points in the track to refill your inventory
